summary: Kelly's path towards happiness is thrown amiss when she witnesses a shocking event, which threatens not just her happiness, but her mental health as well.
cast: Karen Conrad|Marie Devereux|Betty Bronson|Patsy Kelly|Virginia Grey|Michael Dante|Anthony Eisley|Constance Towers|Linda Francis|Bill Sampson|Sheila Mintz|Patricia Gayle|Jean-Michel Michenaud|George Spell|Christopher Barrey|Patty Robinson|Betty Robinson|Breena Howard|Sally Mills|Edy Williams|Monte Mansfield|Barbara Perry|Walter Mathews|Neyle Morrow|Gerald Milton|Fletcher Fist|Michael Barrere|Charlie|Tammy Locke
title: Una luz en el hampa
